mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: View of tower to north of castle

First castle, 11th century. In ruins by 1528, Earl Manners of Rutland began rebuilding 1528, rebuilt again by Eighth Earl of Rutland 1654-1668. Fifth Duke of Rutland remodeled into the shape of a medieval castle 1800-1830. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
